actionCalls.name: Closing_Notification_With_DLP_Issue_Found
actionCalls.label: Closing Notification With DLP Issue Found

value.stringValue: AMC Appointment Closed - DLP Issue Found
AMC case :{!$Record.Case__r.CaseNumber} closed and found a DLP Issue : {!$Record.ServiceNote} , Please Create a DLP Case.
Case Closed on Customer Not Available
Case closed due to customer not available on the case number:{!$Record.Case__r.CaseNumber}. Please check with customer and schedule another appointment.

decisions.name: Check_Get_Assigned_Resource_is_Successful
decisions.label: Check Get Assigned Resource is Successful

Flow.description: Cloned this Flow from " Service Appointment Trigger After Insert | Update -Cloned for Milestone LiveAldar push notification changes for AMC- Previous working version is V21

formulas.name: msgBodyFormula
formulas.expression: CASE( TEXT({!$Record.Status}), "Work In Progress", "Your service appointment is now in progress. We'll keep you updated on the status.", "Assessment Completed", "Your service appointment is now in progress. We'll keep you updated on the status.", "Scheduled", "Your new case has been created and your appointment is scheduled. Check your app for details!", "Re-scheduled", "Your appointment has been successfully rescheduled. Check your updated appointment details in the app.", "En Route", "Your DLP Executive is on the way! You can track their arrival in the app.", "Closed", "Your work order is complete! Your service report has been sent to your app for review.", "Canceled", "Your appointment has been cancelled. If this was a mistake, please rebook at your earliest convenience.", "Cannot Complete", "The issue you raised is not within our service scope. Please contact customer support for further assistance.", "" )

Flow.interviewLabel: AMC Service Appointment Trigger After Insert | Update {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: AMC Service Appointment Trigger After Insert | Update

textTemplates.name: EmergencyTemplate
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.FSSK__FSK_Assigned_Service_Resource__r.Name}, {!$Record.Emergency_Categeory__c} Appointment has been assigned to you.

Here are the Details.

Unit : {!$Record.Unit_from_case__c}

Subject: {!$Record.Subject}

textTemplates.name: NotificationBodyTemplate
textTemplates.text: Dear {!$Record.FSSK__FSK_Assigned_Service_Resource__r.Name}, Service Appointment {!$Record.AppointmentNumber} status changed to {!$Record.Status} related to Case {!$Record.Case__r.CaseNumber}.

textTemplates.name: SupervisorTemplate
textTemplates.text: Dear {!supervisorname}, Details of {!$Record.AppointmentNumber}/{!$Record.Case__r.CaseNumber} have changed. Check the details on portal. Case Status: {!$Record.Case__r.Status} Appointment Status: {!$Record.Status}
